bibl.title: Cleopatra in Josephus: From Herod's Rival to the Wise Ruler's Opposite.
The Wisdom of Egypt. Jewish, Early Christian and Gnostic Essays in Honour of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen
bibl.author: VAN HENTEN, Jan Willem

bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Cleopatra in the Jewish War. - 2. Cleopatra in Jewish Antiquities 14-15. - 3. Cleopatra in Against Apion.
VAN HENTEN Jan Willem, Cleopatra in Josephus: From Herod's Rival to the Wise Ruler's Opposite.

Anthony HILHORST and George H. VAN KOOTEN (Edd.), The Wisdom of Egypt. Jewish, Early Christian and Gnostic Essays in Honour of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen = Ancient Judaism and Early Christianity. 59 (Leiden - Boston, 2005) pp. 115-134.
